mainText:
I can still recall the how I was amazed when I see the first generation of
iPod the first time at the year of 2002. That's the first time I know Apple
products. Not until the iPhone was published, I knew Jobs himself. I had a
first generation iPhone. As a Chinese fan, it is quite hard for me to get
an iPhone that time. You can't possibly imagine, it is a such of proud to
have an iPhone then.

I don't know much about Jobs, all our impressions of him are from his
creative perfect products. As a Chinese style of condolence, I hope he has
his good way to heaven.
author: Guo
